trans-unit.source: Along with derby.authentication.ldap.searchAuthDN, indicates how should bind with the directory server to do searches in order to retrieve a fully qualified user DN (distinguished name). This property specifies the password; derby.authentication.ldap.searchAuthDN specifies the DN to use for the search.

seg-source.mrk: Along with derby.authentication.ldap.searchAuthDN, indicates how should bind with the directory server to do searches in order to retrieve a fully qualified user DN (distinguished name).
This property specifies the password; derby.authentication.ldap.searchAuthDN specifies the DN to use for the search.

target.mrk: Along with derby.authentication.ldap.searchAuthDN, indicates how should bind with the directory server to do searches in order to retrieve a fully qualified user DN (distinguished name).
This property specifies the password; derby.authentication.ldap.searchAuthDN specifies the DN to use for the search.

trans-unit.source: For more information about LDAP user authentication, see "LDAP directory service" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph>.

seg-source.mrk: For more information about LDAP user authentication, see "LDAP directory service" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph>.

target.mrk: For more information about LDAP user authentication, see "LDAP directory service" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph>.

trans-unit.source: If not specified, an anonymous search is performed if it is supported.

seg-source.mrk: If not specified, an anonymous search is performed if it is supported.

target.mrk: If not specified, an anonymous search is performed if it is supported.

trans-unit.source: -- system-wide property derby.authentication.ldap.searchAuthPW=guestPassword -- database-wide property CALL SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_SET_DATABASE_PROPERTY( 'derby.authentication.ldap.searchAuthPW', 'guestPassword')

seg-source.mrk: -- system-wide property derby.authentication.ldap.searchAuthPW=guestPassword -- database-wide property CALL SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_SET_DATABASE_PROPERTY( 'derby.authentication.ldap.searchAuthPW', 'guestPassword')

target.mrk: -- system-wide property derby.authentication.ldap.searchAuthPW=guestPassword -- database-wide property CALL SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_SET_DATABASE_PROPERTY( 'derby.authentication.ldap.searchAuthPW', 'guestPassword')

trans-unit.source: Static. For system-wide properties, you must reboot <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> for the change to take effect. For database-wide properties, you must reboot the database for the change to take effect.

seg-source.mrk: For system-wide properties, you must reboot <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> for the change to take effect.
For database-wide properties, you must reboot the database for the change to take effect.

target.mrk: For system-wide properties, you must reboot <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> for the change to take effect.
For database-wide properties, you must reboot the database for the change to take effect.
